as long as cardname has a plus n plus n counter on it it can attack as though it didn't have defender
as long as cardname has three or more plus n plus n counters on it it can attack as though it didn't have defender
cardname escapes with a plus n plus n counter on it
put a plus n plus n counter on cardname
put a plus n plus n counter on target creature
specialmana put a plus n plus n counter on mikaeus
when cardname has no plus n plus n counters on it sacrifice it
whenever cardname blocks put a plus n plus n counter on it
